org.pepstock.charba.client.items

Class TooltipLabelColor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.commons.NativeObjectContainer
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.items.TooltipLabelColor

  • public final class TooltipLabelColor
extends NativeObjectContainer
    This object contains the color info when a label into tooltip.
    It must be used into label tooltip callback.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero
